children.name: reflow
children.description: Arranges the elements based on the current options.

children.name: rect
children.description: Gets or sets the layout rectangle.

children.name: wrap
children.description: Specifies the behavior when the elements size exceeds the rectangle size. If set to true, the elements will be moved to the next "line". If set to false, the layout will be scaled so that the elements fit in the rectangle.

children.name: orientation
children.description: Specifies layout orientation. The supported values are:* "horizontal" - the elements are arranged horizontally* "vertical" - the elements are arranged vertically

children.name: spacing
children.description: Specifies the distance between the elements.

children.name: lineSpacing
children.description: Specifies the distance between the lines for wrapped layout.

children.name: justifyContent
children.description: Specifies how should the content be justified. The supported values are:* `"start"` - aligns the items to the rectangle origin* `"center"` - aligns the items to the rectangle center* `"end"` - aligns the items to the rectangle end

children.name: alignItems
children.description: Specifies the alignment of the items based on the largest one. The supported values are:* `"start"` - aligns the items to the start of the largest element.* `"center"` - aligns the items to the center of the largest element.* `"end"` - aligns the items to the end of the largest element

children.name: alignContent
children.description: Specifies the alignment of the content. The supported values are:* `"start"` - aligns the content to the rectangle origin* `"center"` - aligns the content to the rectangle center* `"end"` - aligns the content to the rectangle end
